titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
śrī kō māṟa paṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉa cakra-vattikaḷ em maṇṭalamuṅ koṇ ṭaruḷiya śrī kulacēkara tēvarkku yāṇ
ṭu 34 āvatu mitu3na nāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu trutiyaiyum putaṉkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa puṉarpūcattu nāḷ tirumalai nā
ṭṭut tiruk koṭuṅ kuṉṟattu uṭaiyār tiruk koṭuṅkuṉṟa muṭaiya nāyaṉār kōyil śrī paṇṭārattārōm
kīḻ vempa nāṭṭu irācavalli purattuk koṉṟai cēr muṭiyaṉ tirunelvēli uṭaiyāṉāṉa tacca vēḷaikkāṟar
kku piṭipāṭu paṇṇik kuṭutta paricāvatu in nāyaṉārkkum nallamaṅkaiyārkkum tām ceyvitta mahāmaṇṭa
pattukku irākkālattil cantiyā tīpat tiruviḷak kiṭuvatāka varak kāṭṭit tiru viḷak kiṭaiyar vacam aṭaitta muṉṉāḷ mup
pattumūṉṟāvatu paṅkuṉi mātam pattān tiyati mutal aṭaitta āṭu 275 kku āṭu 50 kku nāḷ oṉṟukku aḷakkum -e
nay ta āka ney ****** { aḷavaik kuṟiyīṭukaḷ} m itaṉ etirāmaṇṭu āṭi mātam pattoṉpatān tiyati mutal aṭaitta āṭu 212 kku nāḷ
oṉṟukku ney **** m muṉṉāḷ muppattiraṇṭāvatu tai mātam mutal aṭaittuk kaṇikkuḷ 5 irākka
lattil iṭum viḷakku aṟupa(tu)kku veṭṭiṉa kalveṭṭuppaṭi āṭu 300 kku ney *** ā 700 arai ivvāṭu e
ḻuṉūṟṟeḻupattēḻum cāvā mūvāp pērāṭākak kaikkoṇṭu nāḷ oṉṟukku iṭaiyar aḷakkum ney ***
* * * inney muṉṉāḻi mūvuḻak kāḻākkē iraṇṭaraic ceviṭṭukku nāḻikai ēḻarai eriya iṭum tiruviḷakkup pa
ttākat tiruvi(ḷa)kku nūṟ ṟaimpat tē ḻaraiyum iṭṭup pōtuvō mākavum ippaṭi cantirātittavaṟ celvatākak kalli
lum cempilu(m) veṭṭik koḷvatā(ka) piṭipāṭu paṇṇik kuṭuttōm koṉṟai cēr muṭiyaṉ tirunelvēli uṭaiya
āṉāṉa tacca vēḷaikkāṟarkku śrī paṇṭārattārōm ivai śrīkāriyam piṟavāmaṟ kāttā ṉeḻuttu ippaṭi
kku vāṉō pirā nampiyāreḻuttu ippaṭikku cuntara pāṇṭiya paṭṭa reḻuttu nāyakaṉ tirunilai yaḻakiyāṉāṉa tiru
malai nāṭu paṭṭa reḻuttu ippaṭikku ēkāmpara paṭṭa reḻuttu ippaṭikku ivai māṭā pattiyam
tirumalai yuṭaiyār eḻuttu ippaṭikku ivai tiru mañcaṇa muṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu ivai kōyil kaṇakku tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyā
ṉ eḻuttu
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
